name: Cheeseburger
description: A classic cheeseburger with a juicy beef patty, cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and onion on a sesame seed bun.

name: Veggie Burger
description: A delicious veggie burger made with a black bean patty, lettuce, tomato, avocado, and vegan mayo on a whole wheat bun.

name: Chicken Burger
description: A crispy chicken fillet topped with lettuce, tomato, and mayo on a toasted bun.

name: Double Cheeseburger
description: Two beef patties with double the cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and onion on a sesame seed bun.

name: Bacon Cheeseburger
description: A savory bacon cheeseburger with a beef patty, crispy bacon, cheddar cheese, lettuce, and tomato on a toasted bun.

name: Mushroom Swiss Burger
description: A flavorful beef patty topped with sautéed mushrooms and Swiss cheese, served with lettuce and tomato on a toasted bun.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: A classic pepperoni pizza with a crispy crust, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and spicy pepperoni slices.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: A traditional Italian pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil leaves on a thin crust.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
description: A delicious pizza topped with BBQ sauce, grilled chicken, red onions, and mozzarella cheese.

name: Veggie Pizza
description: A healthy pizza loaded with bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, olives, and mozzarella cheese on a thin crust.

name: Hawaiian Pizza
description: A sweet and savory pizza with ham, pineapple, and mozzarella cheese on a crispy crust.

name: Four Cheese Pizza
description: A rich pizza topped with a blend of mozzarella, cheddar, Parmesan, and blue cheese on a thin crust.

name: Large Pepperoni Pizza
description: A large version of our classic pepperoni pizza with extra mozzarella cheese and spicy pepperoni slices.

name: Large Margherita Pizza
description: A large traditional Italian pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil leaves on a thin crust.

name: Large BBQ Chicken Pizza
description: A large pizza topped with BBQ sauce, grilled chicken, red onions, and mozzarella cheese.

name: Large Veggie Pizza
description: A large healthy pizza loaded with bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, olives, and mozzarella cheese on a thin crust.

name: Large Hawaiian Pizza
description: A large sweet and savory pizza with ham, pineapple, and mozzarella cheese on a crispy crust.

name: Large Four Cheese Pizza
description: A large rich pizza topped with a blend of mozzarella, cheddar, Parmesan, and blue cheese on a thin crust.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with spaghetti, rich tomato sauce, and seasoned ground beef.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: A creamy pasta dish with fettuccine, grilled chicken, and a rich Alfredo sauce.

name: Penne Arrabbiata
description: A spicy Italian pasta dish with penne, tangy tomato sauce, and red chili flakes.

name: Shrimp Scampi
description: A flavorful pasta dish with linguine, sautéed shrimp, garlic, butter, and white wine sauce.

name: Lasagna
description: A hearty Italian dish with layers of pasta, rich meat sauce, ricotta cheese, and melted mozzarella.

name: Mac and Cheese
description: A creamy and cheesy pasta dish with elbow macaroni and a rich cheddar cheese sauce.

name: Caesar Salad
description: A fresh salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

name: Greek Salad
description: A healthy salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, red onions, olives, feta cheese, and Greek dressing.

name: Chicken Salad
description: A light salad with mixed greens, grilled chicken, tomatoes, cucumbers, and balsamic vinaigrette.

name: Caprese Salad
description: A refreshing salad with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, and balsamic glaze.

name: Cobb Salad
description: A hearty salad with mixed greens, grilled chicken, bacon, eggs, avocado, and blue cheese dressing.

name: Taco Salad
description: A flavorful salad with ground beef, lettuce, tomatoes, cheddar cheese, and taco dressing.
